title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger       Our Junior Ranger Program Walnut Canyon National Monument is recruiting Junior Rangers. It is easy to earn your badge. It just takes a little time. Ask at the visitor center for a Junior Ranger booklet. Complete it, hand it in to a ranger to check it, and receive your badge! We are always happy to have new Junior Rangers join our staff!
